metadata.title: CVE-2023-6110 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: [deleting a non existing access rule deletes another existing access rulein it's scope]

criterions.comment: python-openstackclient: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
